data.title: Xali Gold grants 2.2M stock options at $0.05/share to personnel, expiring in 2030.
data.description: In Vancouver, British Columbia on October 30, 2025, Xali Gold Corp. (TSXV:XGC) disclosed that specific directors, officers, employees, and consultants have received incentive stock options. These options allow them to buy 2,200,000 common shares of Xali Gold at a set price of $0.05 per share. The stock options are valid for five years, up to October 30, 2030.

data.title: Egan-Jones report: Rise in data center investment due to AI capabilities. Investors and credit markets comfortable with sector growth.
data.description: A recent analysis by Egan-Jones Ratings Company delves into the significant increase in funding for data centers, shedding light on why credit markets might view this sector more favorably than expected. In recent years, a large amount of capital has been funneled into data center infrastructure as companies seek to support and implement artificial intelligence (AI) technologies. This trend raises a crucial question for both investors and lenders: Are these investments financially secure?

data.title: Celebrate South Coast Plaza's holiday season with new experiences and decor, including annual tree-lighting on November 20.
data.description: South Coast Plaza is set to kick off the holiday season with a fresh array of experiences, stunning decorations, and delightful surprises. The festivities commence with the yearly tree-lighting ceremony on November 20 at Town Center Park. This celebration will run from November 20, 2025, to January 4, 2026. Among the highlights are the Segerstrom family's 44th Annual Tree Lighting event on Thursday, November 20, at 7 p.m. in front of Town Center Park. This event promises to bring joy to all who attend.

data.title: Bodega cat KitKat, killed by self-driving car, lives on through meme coins like Solana and BNB Chain in its memory.
data.description: A popular feline known as KitKat, who resided at a liquor store, tragically lost its life in an incident involving a Waymo vehicle. Following this unfortunate event, traders in the meme coin community have shown support by investing heavily in Solana and BNB Chain tokens. This has led to a significant increase in trading volumes for these tokens, with Solana experiencing a surge of 25% and BNB Chain seeing a boost of 30%. The tragic loss of KitKat has sparked a wave of solidarity among meme coin enthusiasts, who are honoring the cat's memory through their financial activities.
Swiss National Bank Governing Board Member Tschudin: Our monetary policy is expansive.

data.title: Global Uranium Mining Directory 2025 added to ResearchAndMarkets.com offering, covering info on Uranium mining companies for sales leads, investment opportunities, and competitor monitoring. Valuable reference resource.
data.description: Dublin - The "Global Uranium Mining Directory 2025" has recently been included in ResearchAndMarkets.com's available resources. This comprehensive directory contains essential information regarding Uranium mining companies worldwide. It serves as a valuable reference tool for those seeking new sales leads, investment possibilities, or competitive insights. The Global Uranium Mining Directory offers the latest and unparalleled insights into the industry landscape.

data.title: Katie Johnston from Revelation Pharma elected to APC Board of Directors for 4th District, bringing fresh perspective.
data.description: A dynamic and knowledgeable young leader is making waves in compounding pharmacy advocacy. Revelation Pharma, a prominent national network comprising 503A and 503B compounding pharmacies, recently introduced Katie Johnston as a key addition to their team. With a strong background in policy expertise, Johnston is set to bring a fresh perspective to the forefront of the industry. This development, unveiled in Atlanta on October 30, 2025, marks a significant step forward for the company as they focus on enhancing their presence in the advocacy sector.

data.title: WellSky launches AI-powered Ambient Listening for Specialty Care EHR, reducing burnout, streamlining clinical docs.
data.description: A new technology called WellSky Ambient Listening, powered by Suki, is being implemented in Overland Park, Kansas, to simplify clinical documentation and decrease burnout in post-acute environments. This solution aims to enhance efficiency and reduce stress for healthcare professionals working in such settings.

data.title: RunSafe Security CTO Shane Fry to speak at 2025 Embedded World North America Exhibit. Presentation on Nov 5 in Anaheim.
data.description: RunSafe Security, based in McLean, Virginia, a leading provider of cyberhardening solutions for embedded systems in critical infrastructure, revealed that their Chief Technology Officer (CTO) Shane Fry is slated to speak at the 2025 Embedded World North America Exhibition & Conference in Anaheim, California. The event runs from November 4 to 6, with Fry's presentation scheduled for Wednesday, November 5. His talk, entitled “Assessing Latent Risks: A Strategic Approach to Zero-Day Exposure in Embedded Software,” aims to address the emerging challenges in cybersecurity.

data.title: Jackson Hewitt Tax services to hire 15,000 seasonal employees for upcoming tax season amid changes.
data.description: A tax preparation firm in Sarasota, Florida is gearing up for the upcoming 2025-2026 tax season by looking to hire 15,000 seasonal employees. The increased demand for tax preparation services is a result of new tax laws being put into effect. Jackson Hewitt is anticipating a surge in tax returns and therefore needs to beef up their workforce to handle the workload.

data.title: Verisk Analytics Q3 results: earnings $1.72/share (est. $1.70), sales $768.3M (est. $776.1M). FY2025 sales guidance cut.CEO optimistic.
data.description: Verisk Analytics, Inc. (NASDAQ: VRSK) released its third-quarter financial results, showcasing both positives and negatives. The company exceeded expectations in earnings, reporting $1.72 per share compared to the anticipated $1.70 per share. However, quarterly sales fell short, tallying $768.300 million as opposed to the projected $776.094 million. For the fiscal year 2025, Verisk Analytics stands by its adjusted EPS forecast of $6.80 to $7.00, but it has revised its sales outlook from $3.090 billion-$3.130 billion to $3.050 billion-$3.080 billion. CEO Lee Shavel expressed contentment with the company's progress towards meeting long-term growth objectives and highlighted the increasing possibilities for collaboration within the industry. For more details, visit Benzinga.com.

data.title: Legacy Education Inc. to release Q1 earnings on Oct. 30, 2025. Leading career education healthcare provider.
data.description: In Lancaster, California on October 30, 2025, Legacy Education Inc. (NYSE American: LGCY), a prominent career education healthcare programs provider, revealed plans for a conference call to review its first quarter financial performance. This follows the recent announcement by the company regarding this initiative.

data.title: Bridgestone launches premium sports motorcycle tire BATTLAX RACING STREET RS12 in January 2026.
data.description: Bridgestone Corporation has unveiled plans to introduce the high-performance motorcycle tire BATTLAX RACING STREET RS12 in January 2026 in North America. This premium sports tire will utilize cutting-edge racing tire technology to enhance dry grip performance. The launch is set to take place in Nashville, Tenn., and signifies Bridgestone's commitment to delivering superior products to its customers. Look out for the BATTLAX RACING STREET RS12 for an unmatched riding experience.

data.title: Global collaboration between Cintana Education, ASU, and AWS aims to develop AI solutions for higher education.
data.description: In a groundbreaking partnership announced on October 30, 2025, Cintana Education, Arizona State University (ASU), and Amazon Web Services (AWS) have joined forces to create innovative artificial intelligence technologies with the goal of transforming higher education on a global scale. The collaboration aims to leverage the power of AI to revolutionize educational practices across the world.

data.title: Nkarta (Nasdaq: NKTX) to join investor conferences in November. Exciting progress in NK cell therapies.
data.description: South San Francisco-based Nkarta, Inc. (Nasdaq: NKTX), a biopharmaceutical company specializing in engineered natural killer (NK) cell treatments, disclosed its upcoming presence at investor conferences in the coming month.

data.title: Atomic launches PayDirect for bill payments, enabling customers to pay bills through their bank or fintech app, offering clarity and control in managing bills. Increases security and convenience by allowing direct payments to service providers.
data.description: Salt Lake City-based company Atomic has introduced PayDirect, a new feature allowing customers to conveniently handle their bills through their banking or fintech apps. This service provides users with the ability to securely link with various service providers like internet or mobile companies. By utilizing PayDirect, users can access upcoming bills, check their balances, and easily make payments to these service providers. This innovative solution aims to simplify bill management by streamlining the process of viewing, managing, and paying bills all within one platform. PayDirect ensures enhanced clarity and control for users, offering a seamless experience for financial transactions.
18 counterparties take $19.166b at the Fed Reverse Repo Operation.

data.title: InventHelp inventors create HALO HELMET allowing motorcycle riders to signal braking/turning. 2 inventors from LA.
data.description: In Pittsburgh on October 30, 2025, two inventors from Los Angeles, California, unveiled their creation - the HALO HELMET. The helmet is designed to allow motorcycle riders to signal their braking and turning intentions. The inventors aimed to enhance safety on the roads and provide a unique communication method for riders. The HALO HELMET is equipped with innovative technology that enables riders to indicate their actions effectively. This groundbreaking invention has already gained significant attention, showcasing the potential to revolutionize motorcycle safety.

data.title: SiriusXM stock surges 10% after Q3 2025 results: $1.63B subscriber revenue, $2.16B total revenue, $455M advertising revenue. Self-pay subscribers down to 31.24M from 32.81M Y/Y. GAAP EPS 84 cents.
data.description: SiriusXM Holdings Inc (NASDAQ: SIRI) stock saw an increase following the release of their fiscal third-quarter 2025 results. The company reported a quarterly revenue of $2.16 billion, a decrease of 1% compared to the previous year. Subscriber revenue was $1.63 billion for the quarter, down from $1.65 billion year-over-year. GAAP EPS was reported at 84 cents, surpassing the analyst consensus estimate of 77 cents. Advertising revenue also saw growth, reaching $455 million, up from $450 million the previous year. SiriusXM experienced a decrease in self-pay subscribers, dropping by 262,000 to 31.24 million total subscribers compared to 32.81 million the previous year. The self-pay monthly churn rate remained stable year-on-year at 1.6%. More details on SiriusXM Holdings Inc's performance are available at Benzinga.com.
